title: Poster, Visit the American Museum of Immigration at the Statue of Liberty. Statue of Liberty National Monument, NY, 1974
title_raw: Visit the American Museum of Immigration at the Statue of Liberty. Statue of Liberty National Monument, NY
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Printed in black across lower edge: Statue of Liberty National Mounment, New York, New York  U.S. Department of the Interior, National Park Service. Printed in smaller black letters, lower right: FOR SALE BY THE SUPERINTENDENT OF DOCUMENTS, U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE,/WASHINGTON , D.C. 20402 - Price $1.50 - STOCK NUMBER 2405-00539 * G>P>O>: 1974 05-535-172
description: An assortment of Statuettes of the Statue of Liberty in various colors representing the diverse ethnic groups that have emigrated to the United States.  Placed against a blue background, the torches are pointing up toward white letters above each statue. The text reads: Visit the / American / Museum of / Immigration / at the / Statue / of Liberty /. Around the edge of the poster is a white border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Visit the American Museum of Immigration at the Statue of Liberty. Statue of Liberty National Monument, NY, 1974. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1987-24-3
